Html:
Hello
Thank you for the solution.

I was wondering if it is possible to display any color/dots/ image on the MapSample solution.  
I tried but can't find an example. 

What I'm trying to do is to display a dot or color at certain coordinates (Geocodes).

Can this be done? and is there an example?

Thanks.

Hi,

you can download the latest version of D3 in 'Source Code' page, where you can find a PointSetOnMap sample in Nightly/DynamicDataDisplay.sln/Samples solution folder/v0.4/PointSetOnMap.csproj. I think this is what you want.

Best regards,

Mikhail.

Thank you. 

This is what I was looking for. 


It looks like Virtual Earth requires credentials/Key  and I was wondering where I need to change this in the project.

Also where can I sign up to get a key.  Thanks. 


Compiling the project stops in VEImageryServerBase.cs

at the following line 

throw new InvalidOperationException(VE.Properties.Resources.VEServerCannotLoadTile, e.Error);

with error


Server cannot load a tile due to its invalid internal state. 
This could happen because of wrong or expired VirtualEarth credentials.


Thanks again for prompt reply.
